Summary: Biochemical reaction from dasatinib to dasatinib beta-d-glucuronide. This interaction can be catalyzed by UGT1A1, UGT1A9 or UGT2B15.
Biochemical reaction from dasatinib to dasatinib carboxylic acid.
Biochemical reaction from dasatinib to dasatinib n-oxide. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP2C9, FMO3, CYP3A4, CYP1A2 or CYP1B1.
Biochemical reaction from dasatinib to dasatinib M4. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP1A1, CYP1B1 or CYP3A4.
Biochemical reaction from dasatinib to dasatinib M20. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A5 or CYP3A4.
Biochemical reaction from acetaminophen to acetaminophen glucuronide. This interaction can be catalyzed by UGT1A9, UGT1A1 or UGT2B15.
Biochemical reaction from dasatinib to hydroxymethyl dasatinib. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A5 or CYP3A4.
Transport from dasatinib to dasatinib. This interaction can be catalyzed by ABCB1 or ABCG2.
